ModMetaData.name: [1001]Rimatomics Pocket Cooling
ModMetaData.author: papercrane1001
ModMetaData.description:
I wanted a more space-efficient, high-tech way of getting rid of excess heat, so I made this. It transfers heat to a pocket dimension where you'll never have to worry about entropy again -- but it does so at the expensive expense of advanced components and a considerable amount of power. As such, it's best suited for already started reactors.
Like my mod? Donate at: https://ko-fi.com/papercrane1001
I use the MIT license: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT which mostly says that if you use my code, please give me credit.
GitHub at: TBD
Version 1.0.1
